name: SocialSellingMadeSimple
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Real Estate: Social Selling Made Simple w/Marki is the place for REALTORS® to learn how to use social media and tech, so you can sell more homes and help more people. Hosted by Licensed Managing Broker, REALTOR®, avid volunteer, and Major Donor, Marki Lemons-Ryhal. 

With over 25 years of marketing experience, Marki has taught over 250,000 REALTORS® how to earn up to a 2682% return on their marketing dollars. 

As a REALTOR®, Marki has earned several sales awards, the REALTOR® Achievement Award and The President’s Award from the Chicago Association of REALTORS®. 

Six-time REALTOR® Conference and Expo featured attendee, one of 100 speakers selected to speak the REALTOR® Conference & Expo five times, and an Inman closing Keynote Speaker.
By consistently offering sound industry analysis and professional guidance, Marki’s expertise has been featured in Forbes, Washington Post, Homes.com, and REALTOR® Magazine. 

Marki holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Management from Chicago State University a Master’s in Business Administration from Saint Xavier University, and over fifty real estate related licenses, certifications, and designation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
